Articles.Content:
Now that we have tweakables I think it would be a good idea to make it possible to enter a value of the amount of stuff in an item

E.g.

You've picked up the LV-T30 and you want exactly 55.25% thrust.

What you do is put into a type box underneath the slider 55.25%

And there you go the engine now only produces 55.25% thrust at 100% power.

The same could be done for reputable and batteries.

This could also be used while on feul transfer.

For feul transfer you just type the amount of fuel you want from one tank to another.

I sorta like the thrust idea, and the fuel idea but i feel it should be hidden unless you click on something else to input it. As the r click menus can get pretty big and confusing with to many inputs. This shouldn't be always there, as big fuel transports work just fine as is( out and in button)

I think this is a fine idea. another thing I would like to see in regards to tweakables is the inclusion of a "hold ratio" button. Basically, if want a fuel a tank with half the amount of liquid fuel and the appropriate amount of oxidizer, I could press "hold ratio", slide the liquid fuel back, and the oxidizer would adjust accordingly. This would also work on other fuel ratios of course, and would allow a greater degree of precision and customisability
I really like the idea of being able to type the amount of fuel for fuel transfers.
